channel.title: Italian on SoCal Ranch - a (sub)urban ranching experiment in organic and digital life

item.title: Family Buca
item.description: There was an impromptu Iacobucci get together at the Buca Di Peppe in downtown Columbus tonight. There was: Good food (Bread, butter and olive oil, pizza, moist chicken that tasted lemony, spagetti, rigatoni, beer and wine) Good conversation Kids ‘n Chaos The promise to meet again tomorrow for Susie’s wedding and do it all over again Hannah is really having a good time with her cousins – I think she has semi-adopted Raven and Taylor.
